text: The Springfield Falcons are an American professional ice hockey team that began playing in 1994. They currently play in the American Hockey League and are the farm team of the Columbus Blue Jackets of the NHL. They play their home games in Springfield, Massachusetts at the MassMutual Center. Their CHL affiliate team is the Fort Wayne Komets. ==Other websites== *Springfield Falcons' Official Site Category:American Hockey League teams Category:Columbus Blue Jackets Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States
title: Springfield Falcons
